This R markdown script will download the HMP2 data from ibdmdb.org. Specifically, we will download the metagenomic and metatranscriptomic data, and we will then wrangle them into a usable format.

```{r Load libraries and download files}
library(tidyverse)

# URLs for metagenomic (MGX) and metatarnscriptomic (MTX) data
mgx = 'https://g-227ca.190ebd.75bc.data.globus.org/ibdmdb/products/HMP2/MGX/2018-05-04/pathabundances_3.tsv.gz'
mtx = 'https://g-227ca.190ebd.75bc.data.globus.org/ibdmdb/products/HMP2/MTX/2017-12-14/pathabundances_3.tsv.gz'

# Download files
download.file(mgx, '../Datasets/hmp2_metacyc_mgx.tsv.gz')
download.file(mtx, '../Datasets/hmp2_metacyc_mtx.tsv.gz')

df_mgx = read_tsv(mgx)
```
